name: abbidOLD
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: sylib(w0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)), wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)), wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)), wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)))
-| wb(wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)), wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

body.origin: |- wb(wal(s0, wb(w1, w2)), wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cab(s0, w1), cab(s0, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

comment: Equivalent wff's yield equal class abstractions (deduction form). (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2016.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
